version_description:
3.0.3 - Christmas Mode

- Added Christmas Mode
- Added Christmas Gifts in the Shop
- Various animation improvements

3.0.4 - AI Fix & Tiny Tweaks

- Made AI generally less stupid and fixed enemies' jittery hands in Survival
- Minor graphics tweaks

3.0.6 - Multiplayer Undead Quick Fix

- Fixed the Multiplayer undead bug in the last round
NOTE: 3.0.6 can only be played with others on 3.0.5 or later

3.1.0 - Bug Fixes - Round III

- Added Australian multiplayer server option
- Fixed a few tiny bugs and a couple of big bugs

3.1.2 - Quickly Patching a Few Things

- Fixed a crash when getting 3 stars on a boss level
- Fixed a frozen login issue

3.1.3 - A Few More Fixes

- Tentative fix for the boss levels crash
- Tentative fix for the sometimes frozen Shop item lists
- Minor UI graphics fixes

3.1.4 - Multiplayer Bug Fixes & Some Tweaks

- Fixed a few Multiplayer-related bugs
- Moderate stamina tweaks
- Minor physics tweaks
- Minor weapons tweaks

NOTE: You can only play Multiplayer with other people on the same version (3.1.4)

3.1.5 - Last Bug Patch Before Ranked
- Physics improvements
- Vibration improvements
- Griefing prevention
- Minor bug fixes

NOTE: 3.1.5 can only be played with other people on the same version (3.1.5)
